Song.title: You Are Lord
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Bob Kauflin © 1993 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [| Dm Dm/C | G | Dm | Gsus G |]
Verse 1: [Dm]Once we were [Dm/C]sepa[G7sus4]rated,{,}[G7] [ ]di[Dm]vided by [Dm/C]walls of [G7sus4 G7]sin [Gm]Hating and [Gm/F]being [Csus]ha[C]ted,{,} [Gm]ruled by our [Gm/F]pride [Csus C]within Then [Dm]You [Dm/C]took upon Your[G7sus4]self, [ ]the [G7]guilt of ev’ry [Bb2]heart And [F]though we were [Asus4]blind,{,} now [A]we can [Bb]see There [F/A]is no [Eb/G]other [Bb/F]Saviour but [Bb2 F/A]You And You’ve [Gm]brought us to[Bb2]gether
Chorus: [F]You are [C]Lord of [Bb]ev’ry [C]nation [Dm]You are [C]Lord of ev’ry [Bb2]tribe and [C]race And [Dm]by Your [C]blood{,} we’ve re[Bb2]ceived sal[C]vation So that [Gm]we can join toge[Dm]ther And [Gm]worship You as [C]one And [Gm]glorify Your [Bb2]name until You [Dm | C/D | Bb2/D | C/D |]come
Verse 2: [Dm]Different [Dm/C]names and [G7sus4]fac[G7]es, [Dm]each one by [Dm/C]Your de[G7sus4 G7]sign [Gm]Gathered from [Gm/F]ev’ry [Csus]na[C]tion, [Gm]taken from [Gm/F]ev’ry [Csus C]time To [Dm]be a [Dm/C]kingdom of Your [G7sus4]own, [ ]to [G7]serve You without [Bb2]end [F]And to re[Asus4]flect Your [A]perfect [Bb]light For [F/A]all who [Eb/G]live in [Bb/F]darkness and [Bb2 F/A]pain So the [Gm]whole world might[Bb] know that... [(to chorus)]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 once we were separated divided by walls of sin hating and being hated ruled by our pride within then you took upon yourself the guilt of evry heart and though we were blind now we can see there is no other saviour but you and youve brought us together chorus you are lord of evry nation you are lord of evry tribe and race and by your blood weve received salvation so that we can join together and worship you as one and glorify your name until you come verse 2 different names and faces each one by your design gathered from evry nation taken from evry time to be a kingdom of your own to serve you without end and to reflect your perfect light for all who live in darkness and pain so the whole world might know that
